spec_data.Name: rubygem-colorize
spec_data.Description:
Ruby String class extension. Adds methods to set text color, background color
and, text effects on ruby console and command line output, using ANSI escape
sequences.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Sat 29 Jul 2017 11:00:49 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Add color methods to String class
